entries.meaning: A session of observing and identifying birds.
examples: Some students can stake out a square of earth in a flowerbed and keep track of what comes up; others can start a birdwatch recording the numbers and kinds of birds they see.

verbs.description: birdwatch (third-person singular simple present birdwatches, present participle birdwatching, simple past and past participle birdwatched)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To take part in birdwatching; to observe and identify birds.
